raw_json.html_title: New Online Course: Geospatial Data Science with R | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
New Online Course: Geospatial Data Science with R

Posted on October 31, 2023 by XP Song in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on XP's Blog, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

I’m very excited to announce that I have released a new online course ‘Geospatial Data Science with R’ on Udemy!

As part of the opening offer, the first 100 sign-ups will have FREE lifetime access at the following link. Claim yours today: bit.ly/new-geospatial-course

Check out the video trailer and see if the course is right for you:


What sets this course apart from typical data science offerings is its unique focus on spatial problems which offer a visually rich landscape for exploration and analysis. Whether you’re an absolute beginner or a seasoned professional, this course is designed for you to ground your understanding and gain practical skills that can be put into action immediately.

Finally, feel free to share this post with others that may benefit from the course. If you’ve signed up and have any feedback to offer, leaving a rating and review will also help me out a lot!

Happy learning!
Xiao Ping



More information




Links

➡ Go to course here
➡ Extended Content Preview of Week 1: Introduction to R Programming (YouTube)
➡ More information and updates on latest offers: xpsong.com/courses



This post is also shared on R-bloggers.com.

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: XP's Blog.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
